text: Now that April the giraffe has finally given birth, Animal Adventure Park is letting the internet help name the male calf. The Harpursville, New York, zoo has opened a baby - naming contest on their website after the calf ’ s Saturday, April 15, birth. Most Stylish Instagram Pets! Fans can submit any name for about 10 days, with an approximate end date of April 25, at nameaprilscalf. com. Each name submission costs $ 1 with a minimum purchase of five submissions. At the end of the voting period, the zoo will reveal the top 10 most popular names, and people can come back to vote on those 10 for about five days. The proceeds from the contest will benefit the Giraffe Conservation Foundation, Animal Adventure Park and Ava ’ s Little Heroes
